message.body: Do you or Ella have any Thanksgiving requests?
Ella likes meat of any kind..I was thinking of making cranberry sauce and maybe brussel sprouts too
Ooh. Pete is going to reading terminal. I will have him get those things.
Yummm
I got you a pair of sandals today.
You did?! I love your new job!
Yes. And a pair of clog sandals in you want them￼
Should we set a time for tmmrw?
Yeah, what is good for you?
Any time after 3.... 5?
Sure, five is good
The squash I got is weird, you don't happen to have one do you?
No...we won't need it. Food won't be ready til 6. Youre welcome at 5 but just wanted you to know
Oh, we will come a little later then..I'm still writing a paper that is due today : /
Okay. Perfect. Pete is feeling sad and overwhelmed. I'm excited for you to come. I have wine and cider. There will be pie.
Oh poor Pete..I'm excited to see you, Ella is excited to have a "different" thanksgiving
Haha. Did you tell her about jojo?
Would you like to make the cranberries or Brussels sprouts still? I am cooking so i can whip them up if yu don't.
She laughed at his name
I can do whatever, if you think it would be better to have it done, feel free to make it, but I don't mind making things when I get there
Cool.
Almost done, we will be there a little late
That is totally fine. We're running late.
Who assigns a paper on thanksgiving! I can't wait to have a glass of wine
Hey can you walk past the chinese grocery when you get off the train? If they're open, can you grab a big can of pumpkin purée?
Sure!
Are you sure they have it? I can't find any
No. I'm not sure. Our can expired in 2005!
Haha that's Almost as old as Ella
Don't worry about it... Just come over-
We are here
Thanks for coming. You are so great.
You are the great one! Everything was wonderful. Thank you for having us, I can't wait for break and seeing u m
Ore
